trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_DPERJHA_1<tab>You don't have the look of a pirate, but one can never be too careful on this island.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_A1_1<tab>Inquire about entry into the Sastasha Seagrot.

TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_DPERJHA_5<tab>While not yet fully confirmed, the Sastasha Seagrot is suspected of being a Serpent Reaver hideout. Needless to say, Limsa Lominsa cannot have individuals unknown to the thalassocracy waltzing in and out unchecked. I can grant you entry to the caves, but only if you have the proper authorization.

TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_6<tab>To enter the Sastasha Seagrot, you must be in a party of four Disciples of War or Magic with a level of 15 or higher. All members must also have made sufficient progress in the quest “It's Probably Pirates.”
TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_7<tab>Forays into Sastasha are limited to 90 minutes (Earth time).
TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_8<tab>Members level 19 and higher will be synced to level 18 upon entry.

TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_9<tab>All items in a player's loot list will automatically be transferred to that player's inventory upon all other party members leaving the area. Items unable to be obtained will be lost.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_10<tab>You were unable to enter <var 28 ((InstanceContent)) E80304 /var>. Make sure that you and your party meet all the conditions.

TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_DPERJHA_20<tab>You don't have the look of a pirate, but one can never be too careful on this island. Unless you have the proper authorization, I can't let you enter the Sastasha Seagrot.
TEXT_CMNRADENTERSHPOSHAE_00077_SYSTEM_20<tab>To enter Sastasha, you must have made sufficient progress in the quest “It's Probably Pirates.”
